content: free pattern can be found on my blog https //paintitcolorful blogspot com/2021/05/donut-cat-pattern html materials you will need - sport weight yarn in 2 colours - 2 5 mm crochet hook or the size you need depending on yarn you use - polyester stuffing - 8 mm safety eyes/ flat back eyes - tapestry needle - black embroidery thread size the finished doll measures around 3 75 inches tall and 3 5 inches wide you are welcome to use any yarn of different thickness the sizes may vary according to the yarn and hook you use hope you will enjoy crocheting this cute cat donut as much as i did
